segments.text: I see the woman is still drying that plate, completely oblivious to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing and creating a huge mess, but she doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is still stretching to reach the cookie jar, standing precariously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should warn them, but I'm just an observer here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is still waiting patiently for her cookie, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the children before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window is so peaceful, it's like a different world out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm everything looks outside compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge, creating a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children seem to be working together to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what they'll do if the woman catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR
